question: 1. We should turn right side during we are reciting Haiyanlas Salah(in Kamaath) as well as we should turn left ....2. Can u please advise the name of the book for complete sunnah of RSW.
answer:
QUESTION


1.  We should turn right side during we are reciting Haiyanlas Salah(in Kamaath) as well as we should turn left side during we are reciting Haiyanlal Falah (in Kamaath).
Please note, I am not received reply from your end before sent question, kindly reply this query.
2. Can u please advise the name of the book for complete sunnah of RSW.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

1)There is no need to turn to the right and left, during Hayya Alas Salaah and Hayya Alal Falah respectively, in Iqama. If anyone does it, that is not prohibited either.

2) The name of the book is “Sunnats” by Mufti E M H Salejee.

 

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best



Wassalamu Alaykum



Mufti Ebrahim Desai
